thought: To craft a writable book, I need to first craft paper. Paper requires placing 3 sugar canes in the crafting grid, and I have 3 sugar canes in slot 16, so I will move 1 of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1
